name: Koibito no Nazo: Lover's Enigma
description: In Lover's Enigma, you investigate your husband's mysterious death while balancing complex relationships and personal trauma. Navigate a web of secrets involving a hidden cult and key characters. Your choices shape the story and lead to multiple endings.

name: 3D Challenge
description: A playable tech demo for the Nintendo 3DS, made to showcase 3D usage in a gameplay setting. It was playable exclusively by the press at E3 2010, but a prototype has since been uncovered.

name: TelAIphone
description: A hilarious twist on the classic telephone whispering game played as a local party game for 4-8 players. Only now instead of whispering down a line you pass images generated by AI.

name: Rework
description: Build fantastic contraptions in this open world sandbox, set in an expansive forest with ever changing climate. Protect your base from enemies and work together with friends to discover the secrets hidden beneath the surface.

name: Grit & Gold
description: Step into Grit & Gold, shaping your fate amidst the chaos of the California Gold Rush. Build a town from scratch, attracting settlers with diverse buildings. But beware of outlaws aiming to seize your treasures! Can you thrive in the lawless Wild West? Build. Plan. Conquer.

name: City Construction Simulator 2
description: City Construction Simulator 2 is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in charge of delivering construction materials to different parts of the city.

name: The Bad Boy's Cars
description: Welcome to The Bad Boy's Cars game, where dominance is the name of the game.

name: Station Inc
description: In Station Inc, you own a Space Station Business. Take care of your Staff and your funds. Specialize either towards research, Space Tourism or become a Spaceport, all while dodging random events and keeping your crew's morale high.

name: Herald of the Mists
description: A text-based RPG with turn-based combat, dice rolls, and difficult choices. Set out on a mysterious quest in The Mists, where truth fades and reality bends.

name: Gillbert: Guardian of the Grotto
description: Gillbert: Guardian of the Grotto is an adventure platformer set in a collapsing water world, dominated by the evil Broctopus and his bootlickers. Play as Gillbert who uses water to harness power against his enemies.

name: Battleship Athena
description: A sci-fi real time strategy game that allows you to design or download countless custom combat scenarios and play them single player or online with friends.

name: Shamania
description: Shamania is an open world survival game. Get ready to farm, craft, build and fight, but with a unique feature: use your shamanic skills to your advantage in creative ways! Survive in this sandbox with your friends in CO-OP mode.

name: Spice Odyssey
description: A roguelite cooking game about a misfit chef running a small spaceship restaurant on the outskirts of space. Cook and serve your dishes, upgrade your kitchen equipment, and decorate your restaurant. Expand your culinary fame across the galaxy!

name: Furry Fairy Tales
description: ✨Beloved classics in a spicy, furry wrapping. ✨ Adult fairytales with steamy beginnings and happy endings! Choose your character’s gender, solve match-three puzzles, enjoy the fully voiced animations, and find out how your story ends!

name: Dungeons & Furries
description: ✨What's more alluring than the charm of fantasy worlds? Answer: the same, but with sex. The more sex and magic, the better. Choose your character’s gender, solve match-three puzzles, enjoy the fully voiced animations, and find out how your story ends!✨

name: Furry from Outer Space
description: ✨Come on an interstellar trip with Furry from Outer Space — into space, love and steamy sex! ✨ Choose your character’s gender, explore faraway worlds and different story branches while enjoying fully voiced animations! ✨

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe 2: Bridging to the Third Chapter
description: This game will be released in 2080, buy it for your child's child

name: Gatekeeper: Supporter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Conflict: Bark-2
description: This bundle includes:Unique rank 16 gunship fighter “Bark-2”Special weapon: Autocannon 2M-84Active module: “GPB-20000”Unique portrait “Ivan Oakenshield”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Narita - RJAA
description:
This product (ATC4: Airport NARITA [RJAA]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of Narita International Airport in Narita, Chiba, Japan.

name: Arcade Archives VS. The Adventures of Valkyrie
description: Sin descripción

name: IdleMMO
description: An idle MMORPG experience. Go on an epic adventure, hunt diverse enemies, embark on dungeon expeditions, and defeat world bosses even while taking a nap!

name: Super Slime Seriously Sticky Sassy Scripted Survival Simulator
description:
Get a closer look into the daily hazards of a common slime during their life (and death). Adapt. Survive. EVOLVE. Not just your character, but your mind as you come to figure out the ins and outs of this cute little puzzlish- simulator. Die, repeat and learn from your mistakes!

A gamejam game created by Riazey for the Go Godot Jam 3!

name: Nocturnal 2
description: Nocturnal 2 is a fast-paced, 2D Metroidvania. Ignite your sword and explore the dark depths and towering heights of a forgotten island that consumed itself long ago.

name: Hold My Pistaches
description: A dynamic card game where each player becomes a wizard with unique abilities. Use powerful spells, tactical moves and card combinations to defeat your opponents and become the winner!

name: Civita
description: Civita is multiplayer FPS game Enjoy easy and fast movements using the rope action. Long TTK is a bonus! (Only supports Steam multiplayer)

name: Slime Princess
description: Slime Princess is a pixel style stand-alone game that combines platform action, dungeon exploration and Roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a heroic slime and embark on a challenging adventure in order to save the slime princess who has been kidnapped by evil forces.

name: Shoe It All!
description: Shoe it All is a multilinear physics-based adventure game where you rebel against the world with the help of a SWING and SHOES!

name: Hyperacusis
description: A first person horror game where you are an urban explorer that snuck into an abandoned hospital to make content, but little did you know that you are not alone.

name: When The King Speaks
description: Recruit over 65 characters in this turn-based RPG! A living world in which you decide the time of events!

name: Silicon Valley SImulator: 1980s
description: Dive into a journey from a garage entrepreneur to tech mogul in 'Silicon Valley Simulator: 1980s.' Begin amidst the dawn of personal computing, innovate groundbreaking technologies, and navigate the highs and lows of the volatile tech industry.

name: Never Play Evil
description: Step into the dark and twisted world of "Never Play Evil," an action horror noir game that combines puzzle-solving, exploration, and thrilling combat. You will have to unravel every mystery hidden within the eerie mansion as you navigate its corridors and confront the forces that lurk within.

name: One Night At The Shack
description: One Night at the Shack is a psychological horror adventure where you explore a sinister shack haunted by vengeful spirits. Engage in intricate puzzles tailored to each ghost's tragic story, unraveling mysteries and uncovering the dark truth behind their haunting.

name: Tape 101
description: Tape 101 is a psychological Horror game that dives in the Backrooms, explore, interact, solve some puzzles and find your way through the Eerie minimalistic seemingly infinite realms with the help of your RC-Car in hope of finding a way out, yet is there anything to unveil ? can you make it out ?

name: Mini City
description: Reincarnated as an Isekai Lord, you are given a heavenly skill panel that allows you to upgrade your skills to recruit capable people to work with you to solve the threats of the magical beasts you encounter and build your territory.

name: The Hawkers
description: The Hawkers invites you to transform a forgotten farm into an agricultural empire. Build your store from scratch, cultivate unique crops, and uncover the story behind your family's legacy. Can you save the town from Mr. Bunny's wicked schemes?

name: Astrum Vanguard
description: In Astrum Vanguard, a captivating 2D arena shooter, you pilot a spaceship through space as countless enemy ships and alien creatures relentlessly attack you. Survive the endless onslaught in the cosmic battlefield!

name: Brentwood
description: Brentwood is a story-based 2D point and click adventure game.Through your journey you will uncover hidden secrets and your choices will shape the destiny of both characters and the world around them, leading to multiple endings that show the impact of your decisions.

name: GreenGrocer Simulator
description: GreenGrocer Simulator: Manage your own greengrocer shop! Sell fresh produce, satisfy your customers, and expand your business in this realistic and engaging simulation game. Experience the joy of running a successful greengrocer!

name: Crazy Bike Hill Racing
description: Crazy Bike Hill Racing: Unleash Your Inner Daredevil

name: Dragon Heartburn
description: That pizza at lunch was a mistake... Dragon Heartburn is a mix of a top-down shooter and a puzzle game. The dragon gets heartburn in the middle of the workday and needs to get to the infirmary without harming his co-workers!

name: Ascendant Dawn
description: Ascendant Dawn is a grand strategy game where you lead a nomadic tribe in a brutal bronze age world. Work your way up from a small clan to a great empire by founding cities and conquering your enemies.

name: Fox Quest: The Elemental Keys
description: Fox Quest is a puzzle game in which you can move between a real and an alternate world. Using this ability you can change the game environment in one of the worlds causing surprising results in the other!

name: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum
description: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum is a puzzle-based escape room. Solve puzzles and discover the stories of your ancestors in the books you have inherited.

name: Lights In The Sky
description: Step into the boots of a fire lookout in this atmospheric first-person horror game. Armed with only a flashlight and a pump-action shotgun, you must survive the eerie alien threat lurking in the shadows. Uncover the dark secrets and unravel the mystery behind the strange happenings in the area.

name: Monsters of Moldred
description: Monsters of Moldred is a neo-gothic autobattler time and resource management sim. Hire and manage a party of hunters to keep Moldred from falling into ruin while you defeat monsters to awaken the true horror that plagues the land.

name: A Totally Realistic Stealth Game
description: Become a stealth soldier fighting through enemy lines using whatever methods you see fit to stay undetected in this first-person shooter. Take a slow, methodical approach or go guns-blazing; as long as you remain undiscovered anything is possible.

name: Drunken Dragon
description: Welcome to the fantasy tavern simulator where you manage resources, cook meals, and serve unique customers. Unlock recipes, upgrade your inn, and keep your tavern clean.

name: Sisyphe
description: Join a lonely square on it's journey to renew itself along the route to the top of the mountain. Chip off parts off the square to slowly turn it into a new self. Embark on a slow and soft journey through seven beautiful, visually distinct areas.

name: Rampart Defense
description: Rampart Defense is a classic tower defense game where you strategically deploy troops and vehicles to protect your colony from waves of enemies.

name: Brink of War
description: Brink of War is a fast-paced and realistic first person shooter (FPS) game. Everyone can experience the excitement of confrontation. In this game, you can team up with friends in different modes and maps of varying intensity to fight against enemies and compete for victory.

name: Block Rancher
description: Harvest Nature. Make the Goods. Please the Company. ESCAPE THE PLANET. In this sandbox Action-Roguelike you’ll work at a sprawling conglomerate, harvesting creatures and turning them into disposable trinkets for mass consumption.

name: Shugendō: Call of the Spirits
description: Shugendō: Call of the Spirits is a 2D turn-based tactical RPG with unique classes and deep character customization. Explore a mystifying world inspired by Japanese mythology as you slay yokai and restore corrupted spirits. Shape your own stories and strengthen the bonds within your party.

name: Goblington
description: A rogue-lite style city-building game in a relaxed dark fantasy world. Explore your goblin kingdom, find interesting locations and choose your heroes. Defeat hordes of monsters, harvest, build, cook, feed and grow. Good luck!

name: Cog Foo
description: A battle-laden automation game where you have to manufacture everything from battle units down to every bullet! Engage in battles to gather survivors. Manage and feed your people. Mine, farm and Optimize production lines. Can you lead your people to victory?

name: Temporal Cross
description: Combine tactical chess and card gameplay for a unique roguelike strategy experience. Choose your character, refine your deck, challenge bosses, and discover endless possibilities. Each card color triggers unique attribute interactions, unveiling hidden events for new adventures!

name: Intrana
description: Intrana, is an action-adventure FPS game, where the player is tasked with going inside a sick man's body to save him from an alien disease. Explore vibrant environments with fascinating procedurally animated creatures, on your journey to stop this celestial virus!

name: Nullstar: Solus
description: Be. Faster. You are a corporate scavenger drone, sent to rip through the decaying corpse of a dying world to salvage its nullstar. Master flight, thrusters, and face ancient guardians and hazards in 80 precision platformer levels set in the ruins of a civilization where all is not as it might seem.

name: Dolls: The Hunt
description: A cooperative survival horror game where you and your friends must survive being hunted as prey!

name: The Tale of Two Nekos
description: The Tale of Two Nekoes is a 2D RPG game with 3 stories to play through; Dante's Tale, Akari's Tale, and the Final Tale. This battle system is inspired by the first 6 Final Fantasy games while also having some original aspects as well.

name: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger
description: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger is a game based on the TV series Ninja Sentai Kakuranger released for the Sega Pico. Not much is known about the game currently due to lack of preservation.

name: Extreme Car Parking!
description: Prove you're an expert driver in Extreme Car Parking! In each level, you will face a bunch of obstacles on the road. There are orange cones, barriers, and other vehicles to avoid. See how quickly you can stop in the parking spot!

name: Slip 'n Slime
description: Slip and slide around in this slimey pixel-art puzzle adventure! Slide around the level and only stop when you run into something -- SPLAT! Avoid pits and spikes while navigating obstacles, changing your size, picking up obstacles, and.. of course.. pushing boxes. Available in ALL languages!

name: PacaPomo
description: PacaPomo is a cozy productivity app where you raise alpacas and cultivate a farm, all driven by the Pomodoro Technique!

name: Data Man
description: Data Man is a new game for the original 8-bit NES console that brings arcade action to a home console.

name: Shop Town Dooter
description: A chaotic party top-down shooter. In arenas that throw different surprises every round, find a way to out-perform your friends, even if it means cheating, bribing, or bringing a MECH to a gunfight! Upgrade your guns mid-fights for maximum results. - no refunds in case of friendship destruction.

name: Effective Immediately
description: All intergalactic travel passes through the orbital relay checkpoint. Verify ID discrepancies, repair vehicle systems and struggle against ethical dilemmas as you negotiate a shifting political landscape. Report for duty, effective immediately.

name: Sun City
description: Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. You wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.

name: Release Me
description: Blast through hordes of mechanized enemies with spells and upgrades in this roguelite game. Choose your hero and delve into a sprawling skill tree, unlocking devastating magic attacks and obtaining powerful upgrades.

name: Skyfort
description: This game is a arcade block placing game mixed with action-packed Tower Defense gameplay mechanics. Build forts out of tetrominoes high up in the sky and defend it against the incoming waves of airships, by shooting at them with your minigun and building defenses!

name: Squash Sport Game 2024
description: With Squash Sport Game 2024 you can enjoy the most exciting and fastest racket sport playing in four different scenarios and against six players until you get the best score and leave your name to remember.

name: Iso-Core
description: Farm, craft, build, and explore a Beautiful isometric pixel art world. Explore new places and find new biomes to expand your list of items, buildings, and recipes.

name: Getaway Grand Prix
description: Swipe gems and escape the law as a Getaway driver in a thrill ride of HIGH-SPEED MOTOR HEIST MADNESS!

name: Toilet Party
description: New generation mechanics for 2-8 players! We were inspired by the most played TREND modes!

name: The End of History
description: A Strategy RPG where you live freely in a vast medieval feudal-simulated sandbox. Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, serve, own a territory as a noble, usurp the throne, endless wars, and betrayal. The intertwining of your and numerous NPCs' intentions creates unique stories.

name: My Poodle's Diary
description: Step into the gentle world of "My Poodle's Diary," where the life of a black standard poodle named “Calm” unfolds through a series of short stories.

name: Primal Survival Wars
description: Build your own Settlement of Ancient People. Survive, Hunt, Gather, Craft Tools, Fight, Research new technologies and face the challenges that the environment throws at you.

name: Total Zugzwang
description: This is Chess on a conveyor belt -- an ingenious roguelike, melding tactical strategy and explosive action! Deal with a mind-bending scrolling board that pulls towards you relentless waves of foes and perils. Prepare for their violent collision with your pieces. Prepare for Total Zugzwang.

name: Happy Uppen Sometimes Downsad
description: A soul-crushing, non-linear, foddylike Miseryvania.

name: System Shooterz
description: A top-down arena shooter in space where every decision you make can lead to victory...or crushing defeat! Make every shot, rocket thrust, and planet orbit count! Destroy the enemy motherships circling the system in deep space before their drones overwhelm you and exhaust your ship's resources.

name: Fast Food: Restaurant Simulator
description: Catering business is full of challenges, sacrifices and overwork. Still when the clients reserve tables in your diner like crazy, you get enormous satisfaction from your hardships. Build your own Fast Food haven and watch it transform into an empire.

name: Project Rope Tool
description: Play as Arya: junker, ship jockey, and fighter. Lacking working thrusters, her ship is equipped with her latest contraption, the Rope Tool — a grappling hook and a stapler duct taped together.

name: Ninja Ball
description: Welcome to Ninja Ball, where you can step into the arena and unleash your inner warrior in an unparalleled multiplayer experience! Dive into the fast-paced, action-packed world of Ninja Ball, a game that blends athleticism, strategy, and combat into one adrenaline-fueled adventure.

name: MonsterLife
description: Monster Life is a high degree of freedom role-playing game where you will become a newly arrived monster in Demon King City, embarking on adventures in a fantasy world from a unique perspective, exploring the world, enhancing your strength, and collecting a variety of collectibles.

name: Snowbound: Dead of Winter
description: Snowbound is a roguelite farming game with tower defense elements. Build your farm, survive the night with a range of defenses, and complete missions to progress deeper into the forest.

name: Star Child
description: Star Child is an explosive new action-adventure set on a sinister alien planet. Fight numerous aliens and formidable bosses, wield powerful explosives and destructive laser weapons, find secrets and unlock new abilities as you progress. Can you survive your dangerous mission?

name: Prelude to Freedom
description: Prelude To Freedom is a Metroidvania-style 2D top-down action game.

name: Makutsu no Liliane
description: Make money by creating zombies! Liliane, a girl who wants to be a necromancer, creates lots of zombies to earn money to be recognized by her demon lord daddy. Sometimes she will mess around with zombies and wolf boys to make boyfriends.

name: Limbus
description: You continue to wander through an endless looping corridor beside the abyss. Is there a way out... Is there salvation...? You walk on without understanding anything. All you can do is choose the right path. Will there ever be an end to this nightmarish journey.

name: CrateMage
description: CRATES! PUZZLES! MAGIC!! Bewitch Boxes & Puzzle Puzzles to become the one CrateMage to rule them all as you escape from a Crate infested dungeon filled with all manner of Crate contraptions, Magical Trinkets & LAVA! (No really, there is a lot of lava, like far too much lava).

name: Seabed Settlers
description: A citybuilder inspired by classics such as Ceasar III, Anno, Pharaoh and others which takes place the bottom of the ocean. The surface has become uninhabitable and raybomb radiation has turned many into mutants. It is your job to set up your underwater empire and guide new humanity to greatness!

name: Sprint Star: A Running Manager
description: We present a running management simulation. Train your hero in different running disciplines, keep an eye on his health and energy level and race against the best in city or hill runs!

name: Midnight Watch
description: Midnight watch: When night falls, creepy shadows creep through the halls and unseen spirits roam. Take up your watch and expose the disturbing truths hidden in the darkness. Will you survive the night, or will the midnight terrors consume you?

name: Strange Labyrinth
description: Amy is pulled into a dimension of labyrinths by the villain Ayashii Meiro, who mysteriously appears on her TV. Now, Amy must solve the puzzles of the labyrinths and defeat Ayashii Meiro to return to her world, collecting fragments of her soul along the way.

name: Toys Cracker
description: Toys come to life to engage in epic battles!A unique 2D fighting game, skillfully blending elements of "Smash Bros" and "Mario Odyssey". Skillfully transfer the soul of your characters and gain advantage by creating the best possible synergies.

name: Mozi
description: In the distant Milky Way galaxy, there hides a mysterious planet named Mozi Planet. This planet has a vast and boundless ocean, and every drop of seawater is shining with a mysterious light, as if telling the ancient interstellar secrets.

name: G.R.E.G.: The Generally Really Easy Game
description: Welcome to G.R.E.G. - The General Really Easy Game, a minimalistic precision platformer that has some arguably difficult levels

name: Gassy Getaway
description: Gassy Getaway is a hilarious office escapade where urgent tasks collide with uncontrollable flatulence! Maneuver through the chaos, complete assignments, and avoid embarrassing encounters with colleagues before dashing to the restroom. Can you keep it together in this laugh-out-loud challenge?

name: Mercenarian
description: In a world full of monsters, always look for better weapons & skillstones that gain your enemy's ability. Even you can spit poison like the poisonous spider, so slash all of them and look for it. Sharpen your weapon, upgrade your status, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary.

name: Carts Battle
description: Race and battle in Сarts Battle! Equip your car with weapons, outmaneuver rivals in thrilling drifts, and dominate the explosive racing arena. Ready, set, smash!

name: Numbers.io
description: Navigate a numeric arena in Numbers! Dodge big digits, merge smaller ones, and strive for 2048+ in this addictive, strategy-driven merging game. Start merging now!

name: War of the Western Deep
description: Explore a lush, hand-animated world as you solve puzzles, meet intriguing characters, and duel nefarious foes in tense sword battles. Join Mirren, a royal courier sent to the dangerous Border Coast on the eve of war, and immerse yourself in this innovative mix of adventuring and cinematic combat.

name: Soar Up The Charts
description: Soar Up The Charts is a fast-paced rhythm game and arcade style rail shooter where music is your weapon! With tracks provided by Alden Ave and KeepFlying, be ready to turn it up and blast your way through those radio robots!

name: The Last Knight
description: Earth has been seized by aliens! You are the pilot of the last Knight - a gigantic combat robot. Explore the ruins of civilization, battle giant monsters, travel through time, and prevent humanity's defeat!

name: Paint-guin
description: Color 2D and 3D object in a first person shooter, alone or with friends

name: Shop Crush
description: A Dating Sim meets a Shop Simulator. Will they match? You tell me! Open your Shop and sell the best goods you can find to meet beautiful women and men and make new friends. Choose between selling the desired items or making a profit, but try to balance the relationship or the budget!

name: Survivors of Journey to the West: Bald Guy vs Wukong
description: "Survivors of Journey to the West: Bald Guy "vs" Wukong" is a spin off story about the product "Survivors of Journey to the West". The story draws inspiration from the Western Journey to the Wilderness and traditional cultivation system, playing the role of the Flower Monk - Lu Zhishen, who explores the world of Western Journey, freely combining various gameplay and genres through over 200 massive skills and resonance. At the same time, you can also meet Taoist priests, farm and build, recruit young brothers, and fight against enemies together

name: Super Drift Blade
description: Explore the world of Super Drift Blade, a Roguelike game where you can slash with just a swipe of your mouse.

name: Oil Truck Transporter
description: Oil Truck Transporter is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful oil truck.

name: The Time Game
description: Bend the rules of time to your while to outsmart and out-think your opponents. Fun 4-player co-op strategy card-game which will leave you on the edge of your seat!

name: Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Knight Recon: Tracer Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Grassassins
description: Gather your crew for an intense 2-4 player showdown in Grassassins, where stealth, cunning, and strategy will determines who is the ultimate Assassin!

name: Timestamps: Lost Love
description: An exciting adult Visual Novel with a unique intriguing story featuring Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Sex, Humour, Character Development and some fun references.

name: Tower Networking Inc.
description: An internet service provider simulation game. Design and build network connectivity and services to clients in an ever-expanding randomly generated tower. Configure and maintain equipment to ensure you meet the requirements of tower dwellers. Manage your spending for expansion and daily operations.

name: Flaky Love
description: A plot-oriented, full-motion live-action interactive video work, which is different from the traditional fantasy love interactive work. The love, hate, affection, and hatred you gain all depend on your current choices.

name: Tea for Sana
description: Tea for Sana is an explorable visual novel set in the mountains of a Slavic-inspired fantasy world. Discover recipes, forage for ingredients, and cook traditional dishes to restore the balance between the mountain spirits and the villagers below.

name: Fairway to Hell
description: Welcome to the Afterlife, where salvation comes with a scorecard. In Fairway to Hell, you find yourself in the most unexpected predicament—dead, in hell, and holding a golf club. Prepare for the most unconventional round of golf you've ever played. Welcome to hell; we hope you like the greens.

name: Little World
description: Explore myths in 'Little World,' a strategic blend of auto-chess and tower defense. Assemble heroes from legend to outwit opponents in a magical realm. Each battle tests strategy, every win showcases your tactical genius.

name: Snaps
description: Dive into an anime-themed FPS and tower defense game! Battle cultists in dungeons, defend your village, and forge relationships with NPCs. Customize weapons and enjoy casino games. A thrilling blend of action and strategy!

name: Frankie and Suede Private Detectives
description: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure.

name: FightGirl
description: Horizontal fighting, a game of passionate competition.

name: Game of Evolution
description: Game of Evolution: Idle Clicker & Merge Life! Human evolution clicker game! Idle tycoon — merge to create life! Evolution game

name: Holy Stone Mage
description: This is a mixed type game that can cultivate characters, and battles can be divided into tower defense and duel modes. Players can also enter random maps for exploration, challenge difficult bosses, or discover treasures

name: Flame Land
description: A 2D platformer inspired primarily by Kirby's Adventure and secondarily by classic Sonic. A collectathon with new characters and exits hidden around every corner, and an arcade game in which you compete for high scores. Cute and colorful, snacky and full.

name: SwingHard
description: A Dark Fantasy Boss Rush game that will give you a real workout. Swing Hard to do damage. Parry by accurately aiming your weapon. Dodge by moving your body. Squat To Move options for those with limited space. Swing hard, move often, you'll need to exercise your mind and body to win.

name: Dice with the Devil 2
description: Out-luck your opponents in Dice with the Devil 2, a horror themed deckbuilder where you unlock and collect special dice, customise them, and strategize your best hand of 3 to win your opponents' souls.

name: TunTun
description: COME ON DOWN!! If you live for chaotic numskully activities while trying to survive with your pals, then the tunnels might be right for you.

name: Box Bakery
description: This is a simulation management game for baking bread. You need to earn more coins by continuously selling bread to animals customer, thus unlocking more types of ingredients and other rarer animals.Unlock more of their stories and collect items as well as stickers to learn the stories behind them.

name: One Minute To Close
description: 1 Minute to Close is a stealth adventure game set in a supermarket after hours. Utilize the environmental interactions and physics based tactics to outsmart the shop assistants who use an advanced AI that learns from your actions.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attornauts
description:
The law has changed.
The year was 202X. Humanity has expanded into the depths of the solar system. For many, Earth is but a distant memory told in stories. One colony, the brave souls who defended their clients, were determined in soul combat by the “atonauts,” who manipulated barristers with their soul lives, and the verdict of the law was considered too great to be handled by the mere replacement of mechanical weapons called “barristers". In neo-Old Tokyo, the legal system was burdened with the word.

name: Tidal Nexus Online
description: Tidal Nexus Online is a submarine themed old school open world MMO. Fight with monsters, trade and collect valuables in the depths to upgrade your sub. Join clans, participate in world events, make friends and enemies along the way.

name: Some Heroines Climb Up a Tower to Ask God Why the Game Has a Name That's So Long
description: In this erotic turn-based strategy rogue-like, make it to the final boss by pushing and pulling your way through a relentlessly difficult horde of God’s demonic angels. Get new sets of class skills every single run and master them to combo your enemies back into the afterlife.

name: Ruins of Endoth
description: Third-Person ARPG set in a dark fantasy world. Fight enemies, collect random loot, level-up and explore the World of Endoth. Forge your destiny amongst it's heroes!

name: Turnabout Detectives
description: Turnabout Detectives is a big ol' tale that features Detective Gumshoe as the defendant! However, the plot twists and turns and soon things are a lot worse for more than just Gumshoe...

name: Soucha Yi Ke
description: Sin descripción

name: Secrets of Merveille Castle
description: In this case, you play as detective Felix Pursuit (he's so cool), investigating a castle that's been repurposed to a theater, after he learned that a master criminal and also his arch nemesis... plans to pay the place a visit. Time to uncover secrets.

name: Nitro Champagne Tower
description: Let's build a champagne tower with glasses filled with liquid explosives. It's the only way to repay a debt of $1,000,000. ...Really?

name: Net.Crawl
description: Net.Crawl is a puzzle rogue-like about White Rabbit lost in the unfriendly cyberspace. Dive deep into the bizarre digital world and outsmart dozens of unique Cores(mini-bosses). Short runs, deep strategies, crazy combos and a ton of replayability.

name: Influencer Boxing
description: Step into the ring with "Influencer Boxing," a thrilling game featuring 12 of your favorite social media stars. Each influencer brings their unique style and charisma to intense boxing matches, set in dynamic, visually stunning arenas

name: Scad
description: Scad is an action packed roguelite apocalypse adventure. Fight against zombie hordes, craft & upgrade new weapons and prepare for new missions.

name: Defend 99
description: DEFEND 99 is a rogue-lite tower defense game with deckbuilding and autochess elements. Place your turrets, roll for upgrades and balance your economy in the hope of defending your network of the elite from an array of digital attackers. Can you hold off all ninety nine waves?

name: Robin: The Twisted Timber Trail
description: Join Robin and navigate narrow wooden paths, solve puzzles, and help animals and villagers as you uncover hidden trails and secrets.

name: Orbit
description: The protagonist robot, Nico, explores a ruined planet and uncovers its hidden secrets.

name: On a Journey RPG
description: A Golden-Age of 2D JRPG's returns with Turn-Based Combat & Retro-Inspired Graphics! Adventure across the world, meet new friends and unlock powerful Summon Monsters as you battle against a truly formidable enemy in this Story-Rich JRPG

name: Inspection Report
description: Inspection Report is a horror / point & click game focused on exploration and dialogue. Fulfill your duties as a building inspector and uncover the secrets of an abandoned property in total dark using only a flashlight.

name: Day Off: Moonriver Incident
description: An atmospheric 2D top-down shooter with an open world and physics. Step into the role of a police officer from an old horror movie. Discover what happened in the town of Moonriver. Use your brain against zombies - create barricades with the furniture, stay quiet, or unleash full-blown action!

name: The Nick
description: A horrific adventure where you play as Nick, who needs to find a way out of an abandoned mansion. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets this place holds and still stay alive...?

name: Tempus Triad
description: In Tempus Triad, dive into an ancient first-person horror scenario where a scientist is thrust into an era where huge predators dominate the land.

name: Bigfoot Life
description: A simulator game where you live life as Bigfoot. Catch fish, forage for mushrooms and berries, build shelters, and more. Survive and live your best Bigfoot Life.

name: Two Broken Mirrors
description: Classic survival horror with a twist. The whole mansion is ALIVE!. Will you get out or will it get you?.

name: Bodega
description: Bodega is an immersive tycoon where the options are limitless. Take charge of many small bodegas located across 1990s NYC to satisfy customers from all walks of life. Accompanied by a bodega cat, you and your companion will overcome any challenge thrown at you.

name: Obi3011
description: This is cyberpunk themed, pixelated love adventure text game. A rainy encounter and an inevitable cohabitation lead to a journey of mistaken identity. As a robot, your funny love adventure story with your beastmen partners unfolds from here.

name: Anoxia Station
description: After a supervolcano eruption, Earth has become uninhabitable and humanity is on the brink of extinction. We need to go underground. Anoxia Station is a dark strategy game in which you manage a mining station and fight for survival, extract resources and take life or death decisions over your crew.

name: Metal Bunny
description: Feel the thunderous beats in your bones and let the electrifying guitar riffs guide your way. It's not just a game, it's a headbanging adventure!

name: The Rolling Room
description: Unleash your creativity in "The Rolling Room," the ultimate design and decorating game! Transform ordinary rooms and unique spaces like camper vans and buses with stunning realism.

name: Supercells
description: A tower defense game featuring a war between human cells and bacteria.

name: Kioku
description: Reclaim the memories you lost, fight for what is rightfully yours. Explore worlds that seem familiar but not quite. You progress through places that resembles memories you once had. Push forward until you find the reason you're here.

name: Guru Guru
description: Guru Guru is an 8-player physics-based party game. You and your friends become round and adorable GuruGuru monster, unleashing wild combo moves and smashing your opponents, or YOUR FRIENDS!

name: Kombat Hamster
description: Kombat Hamster is an idle clicker simulation game. Grow your empire to get more hamster coins in the fairest business simulator.

name: PolyDrift
description: Free demo available with 4 first levels Prepare to immerse yourself in the neon-soaked world of drift racing mastery. Customize your ride, perfect your technique, and chase the ultimate thrill of the drift. The leaderboard awaits - will you rise to the challenge and claim your place among the elite?

name: Police Atv Offroad
description: Welcome back, Lieutenant. Today marks a new chapter in your career as a police officer.

name: Short Snow
description: SHORT SNOW! Realistic open-world survival experience, you find yourself lost in a vast, snow-covered forest after a harrowing plane crash. With temperatures plummeting and hunger gnawing at you, will you succumb to the forces of nature, or will you conquer the frozen wilderness? The choice is yours!

name: Temporal Titans
description: Temporal Titans is a Tower-Defense game with Time Travel. Send mechs back to previous waves to prevent your defeat, and protect your salvage team from the monstrous Krell as you scavenge the ruins of a lost earth. Rewind, rethink, and reclaim the future!

name: Evoplasm
description: Evolve and fight in this creature building Roguelike. Grow a creature by attaching new cells, add mutations to create powerful synergies, fight real-time tactical battles against weird enemies, and strategically choose a path across multiple campaign acts. Inspired by games like Spore and FTL.

name: GreenWood Defense
description: Defend your captain using units to fight off invading frogs. Level up your units to unlock their new abilities, purchase upgrades, and gain special abilities to win battles against the invaders.

name: Into the M.A.W.
description: In this action-packed co-op adventure, four players must unite to crew a spaceship through a web of interconnected story missions. Choose your role—Captain, Pilot, Gunner, or Engineer—and make decisions that shape not only your journey, but the future of a galaxy on the brink of war.

name: Chiral
description: A sci-fi dark-comedy puzzle game. In Chiral, you'll assume the role of a disembodied brain in a jar, paired with a digital AI companion. Together, you'll navigate a labyrinth of mirror, laser, and gravity puzzles that will challenge your spatial reasoning and leave you both laughing and bewildered.

name: Dual Eclipse
description: Delve into mysterious dungeons and discover a way to restore order to the cosmos in this trick-taking dungeon crawler. Evade traps, discover secrets, and strategize with unique trick-taking combat. Change the tide of battle with powerful eclipse cards, strengthen your deck, and parry cards!

name: Sword & Seek
description: Sword and Seek is a cozy fantasy hidden object game set in a medieval world, where players embark on a journey to receive the blessing of the goddesses to become adventurers.

name: Beauty vs. Zombie
description: In this tower defense game, players defend homes of beauties from zombies. With diverse girl characters, each with unique skills, players strategically deploy defenses, face bosses, and cooperate in multiplayer. Courage and wit lead to victory in "Battle of Beauties vs Zombies"!

name: Guns are Funs
description: Guns are Funs is a fun and exciting arcade game for people of all ages. It will help develop coordination of movements, accuracy and logical thinking. You have to shoot from a toy cannon at towers made of cubes.

name: Sigma War Notes
description: This is an ACT action game that can achieve a satisfying sense of impact through simple operations.

name: Twilight Tonics
description: Manage your own potion shop, concocting powerful elixirs that heal, deceive, and empower. Explore the dark fantasy world to collect mystical ingredients, and take on special orders to influence warring factions.

name: Cosmic Remnants
description: In Cosmic Remnants, you find yourself adrift in space with only a floating platform. Alone or with friends, survive by scavenging resources, upgrading your platform, and enhancing yourself with discovered body parts. Explore advanced bases and uncover the truth behind humanity's demise!

name: Express Car Wash Simulator
description: Run your own Car Wash company! Wash cars, earn money, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles!

name: Clumsy Coffee Simulator
description: Brew, Spill, Repeat!Step into the chaos as a clumsy barista, crafting drinks and building your dream café. Customize your space, manage orders, and embrace the spills and fun in this engaging simulator.

name: Logistics Tycoon Simulator
description: Start small, think big in “Logistics Tycoon.” Begin with a single vehicle and expand your freight empire across challenging terrains. Manage a fleet, tackle challenging deliveries, and optimize logistics to grow your business. Are you ready to become the ultimate logistics tycoon?

name: Save
description: Save is a survival deep sea horror game for 1-4 online co-op game, sets in the eerie depths of an abandoned 6,000-Ton Ship 'SENARA', where every shadow holds a secret, and every corner could be your last. Unravel the mysteries and safely escape avoiding relentless threats that prowl in the darkness.

name: Only One Sword
description: Join the epic journey of a sword rising from dungeons to the surface. Defeat enemies, grow stronger, and return to your master because they need you!

name: Deeplands
description: Explore the Deeplands, an ancient underground world harboring the remnants of a lost civilization. Fight and parkour your way through destructible caves and dungeons, acquire mysterious powers and tools to grow stronger and recover the ancient dwarven crown in this open-cave roguelike platformer!

name: The Supper: New Blood
description: Do you hear the doorbell, Stewie? Your first guest is here...and something tells me they’ll never leave this motel...

name: Hypno
description: Mind melting techno orgasm! Rhythm game based on DJing principles, music remixing techniques & VJing experience.

name: South Words Hero
description: Explore a world where names are everything. Rip letters from your own name and use them as weapons, shields, and tools. Each name opens new possibilities.

name: Robabekya
description: You envision a futuristic scenario where humans coexist in an open world alongside robots disguised with human-like skins, equipped with dynamic and adaptive system where AI learns from previous engagements, adjusts tactics, and becomes increasingly proficient in combat scenarios.

name: Frog Holm
description: Unexpectedly, you become the owner of a pub that has seen better days. During the day, set sail to explore a variety of new islands, each with its own unique treasures and ingredients for your cocktails. Can you restore the pub to its former glory? Dive into this charming adventure and find out!

name: Royal Revolt Warriors
description: Thrilling 1-4 players co-op survivor gameplay combined with stunning graphics, where powerful Warriors battle through hordes of vicious enemies using a blend of melee and ranged weapons.

name: The Colony: New Haven Chronicles
description: New Haven is a utopia under a red moon, turned into a dystopian nightmare. You are a prisoner with no name, waking up in the middle of an emergency. Fight for survival guided by an enigmatic voice in your head, explore a falling world, solve puzzles, and unravel dark secrets.

name: Norbert's Diary
description: Norbert's Diary is a retro-themed psychological horror game set in the 2000s. In it you will learn the story of Norbert, the guy who opened a gas station in the forest. You have to earn money and serve customers, but who knows what, or who, can kill you.

name: Truckful
description: Drive your pickup truck through seemingly peaceful countryside valleys, deliver much-needed goods to local townsfolk and unravel the small town mystery. Beware, the old forest is watching.

name: The Stalked 2
description: "The Stalked 2" is a standalone horror sequel to "The Stalked", where you play as Rachel, an avid hiker. What begins as a relaxing hike to a cabin turns into a nightmare filled with eerie interactions and unsettling events. Will you survive?

name: Orcdom
description: A traditional tower defense blend of popular elements, placing buildings and casting spells at just the right time to resist the onslaught of orc hordes.

name: The Legacy
description: Cooperative survival and horror genre. You and your family have returned to your native land, on which a terrible curse and darkness has fallen. Will you be able to survive in a harsh and dangerous environment and stop the evil? It depends only on you, on your skills and ability to help each other.

name: Memories Not Found
description: Travel through surreal worlds and make new friends while trying to unravel the secrets of your past…

name: Umigame
description: Umigame is an explosive roguelite multiplayer adventure. Defeat challenging enemies. Protect and strategically use the Egg, a powerful artifact essential for victory. Unlock unique characters, builds, and strategies in every session.

name: Jab Juggernauts
description: Step into the ring with our exhilarating boxing game! Bringing every punch and knockout to life. Master your skills, earn achievements, and rise to the top. Whether you're a casual gamer or a boxing enthusiast, this game promises action-packed fun and endless challenges!

name: Tales of Frah'Akin
description: Tales of Frah’Akin is an upcoming story-based fantasy RPG, in the style of the old classics but with a modern touch, rich with cinematic cutscenes.

name: Dark Symphony
description: Dark Symphony is a music-based single-player horror game involving a madman's obsession with cult classic "Lincolnshire Posy." Find all six records lost during the man's drunken slumber, or risk the murder of your wife. Exit the cabin if you dare.

name: The Golden Light Guardian
description: Save The Mysterious Island! Craft tools, gather resources, and build defenses on a mysterious island. By day, explore and hunt. By night, fight off undead hordes to protect the island's light!

name: Story of a Hunter
description: Incarnate an adventurer in the small town of Voran. Meet the citizens, personalize your house, play minigames and write your own story in this turn based RPG dungeon crawler.

name: Greenhaven Realms: Idle RPG
description: Greenhaven Realms is a fantasy medieval Idle RPG where players embark on epic adventures. Engage in thrilling combats, craft powerful items, gather resources, mine for treasures, trade goods, and explore vast lands. Build your kingdom and shape your destiny in the enchanting world of Greenhaven.

name: Escape From Police
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed chases in "Escape From The Police"

name: Prize Pact
description: Prize Pact is a thrilling deckbuilder where you spin high-stakes slot machines, discover game-changing wild symbols, and trigger outrageous combinations. Build your deck with unique reels, outsmart the house, and chase the ultimate jackpot in this electrifying roguelike adventure!

name: PsychexFuse
description: A lovingly hand-drawn adventure into esoteric worlds filled with threats, puzzles and horror. Help, save and clash with past versions of yourself, and unravel the mystery behind two and a half gods at war.

name: Skyward Steps Together
description: Chaos erupts as the Harmony Stone shatters, scattering fragments across the sky. Team up with up to four players, navigate the disrupted city and restore balance by retrieving the stone pieces.

name: 100 Rules (To Live By)
description: You are an elephant, and every star you eat adds a new rule to your life. Time to survive.

name: Nice To Yeet You
description: Grab your controller, buckle up, and prepare for a face-off like no other in Nice to Yeet You!

name: Trouble Makers
description: Let's Make Trouble!!! Survive as long as you can, but more importantly cause trouble. Take control of the trouble makers. Collect up to 4 weapons at a time and power up your trouble bar to send waves of pain to other players.

name: Treasure Royale
description: Fight against greedy pirates to steal precious gems or uncover the hidden treasures to become the king of the cursed islands! Play online with random players or with your friends now for free!

name: Keep Leapin'
description: It will be too tempting to lose yourself in the thrilling but lethal momentum of this physics based platformer. Jumping, swinging and sliding has never felt more satisfying! Can you make it all the way to the top? Get yourself comfy, put a podcast on and Keep Leapin'!

name: Girl is coming
description: This is a love game that simulates management, and the daily life in the game, such as hunting, fishing, purchasing, chatting and playing with beautiful women, giving them food, clothing, beauty products, etc., has won their favor, and at the same time, they have also gained their love!

name: Chronicles of Zimoria
description: Chronicles of Zimoria is a creature-catching game set in the world of Zimoria. Explore diverse landscapes, collect Metals, and conquer Battle Challenges to document over 150 unique Zimon species. Confront the evil Cult of the Marionette and thwart the Puppet Master's plans in this adventure.

name: Grit Porn Video Tapes
description: Babsy, a former porn actress, wakes up abruptly in a deserted spa, surrounded by an eerie silence echoing off lifeless walls. The only activity traces are old cameras, CRT televisions, and scattered VHS tapes as remnants of a forgotten past. With no memory, no explanation.

name: Datbyel's Nebula
description: After resigning from the major corporation Conek Energy, Ellie accidentally falls into the mysterious world of Datbyel. In Datbyel, Ellie solves puzzles, engages in battles, and converses, discovering more about herself and Anchita.

name: Featherborn
description: Take up the power of the relics to save your home of Loftilla from the dark beast imprisoned beneath it!

name: K-Pop!
description: Become the ultimate manager of tomorrow's superstars with "K-Pop!", an addictive clicker game created by stans for stans! Gather billions of fans, unlock idols at every milestone, compare your score with your friends and become the ultimate k-pop manager.

name: Medieval Farm
description: Um jogo online que mistura elementos de fazenda com um ambiente medieval

name: Guardians of Restoration
description: Top-down robot action game combining action and bullet hell.

name: Eonheart
description: Explore Eonheart, an enigmatic machine complex in this classic-style 2D Puzzle Platformer where you can create platforms by yourself and manipulate them to traverse the complex, brave dangers, surpass challenges, solve mechanisms, and discover long-lost secrets!

name: Silly Suspects
description: Silly Suspects is a hilarious first-person detective RPG. Catch crafty criminals by exploring whimsical cities, analysing bizarre crime scenes and investigate quirky characters to unravel a wild mystery in this comedic twist on the classic murder mystery genre.

name: Zodiac Mountain
description: "Zodiac Mountain" is a roguelike-deckbuilding game following the journey of a Panda as they embark on a journey to become a Chinese Zodiac.

name: Photo Studio Simulator
description: Run your own photography studio, adjusting each customer’s joints based on their needs to create a variety of poses and styles, showcasing your unique creativity. Upgrade cameras and equipment, take photos that cater to customers' preferences, and earn more rewards.

name: Summer Haze/Glory Days
description: Go on a cross-country tour with your band in pursuit of fame, success, and happiness in this drama visual novel set during the summer of 2007.

name: Sea of ​Mutation
description: Take you into the crisis-ridden nuclear contaminated sea where all the creatures are slowly mutating. You will play an initial ordinary fish, in the nuclear pollution of the sea to survive. You will grow up to become a sea monster, and eventually become the only master of the sea.

name: Forgetting Emily
description: Forgetting Emily is a fully immersive, live action, interactive game where you can date beautiful women while avoiding the pitfalls of ... well, dating beautiful women!

name: Impious
description: Impious is a dark roguelite RPG with turn-based combat where you strategize, fight, and equip your character to escape a brutalist indoctrination center. Upgrade your gear, manage your will, and interact with other captives in a relentless fight for freedom.

name: My Immortal Sect is Very Powerful
description: "My Immortal Sect is Very Powerful" is a fairy-themed simulation management game focusing on equipment trading.

name: Neighbor Next Door
description: Someone just moved into the apartment next to you. He appears to be an elderly gentleman, radiating kindness and a gentle demeanor. His warm smile and soft-spoken nature make him seem trustworthy and amiable, so when he asks you for a favor, you agree without hesitation, but that will cost you everything...

name: ExerciseSimulator Vol.1
description: This is a simulator where your uncle exercises hard on a rodeo machine. Customize the look and movement of the rodeo machine to give your uncle lots of exercise.

name: Becut
description: Dive into this social deduction party game for 4 to 12 players. Collaborate to prepare the ogre's feast and identify the traitors hiding among you. Your sense of direction and memory will be key assets to avoid getting lost in this randomly generated castle.

name: Eggman
description: in a dangerous world, Alone to find all of my family

name: Winter Survival Simulator
description: Winter Survival Simulator is a survival game where player find themselves stranded in a remote, snow-covered mounting forest area. With limited resources and facing extreme weather conditions, they must utilize their survival skills to stay alive until rescue arrives.

name: Vigilant Inquest
description: Vigilant Inquest is a movement shooter where you play as a detective that got fired from their job because one case that was dropped just didn't sit right with you, so you go out on your own to find out the truth about the abandoned factory.

name: Final Fantasy IX Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Mirage Noir
description: Play as a detective, solve cases, and try to catch an elusive serial killer in this mystery visual novel focused on found family

name: Ken's Labyrinth II
description: An upcoming fan sequel to Ken Silverman's all time classic, Ken's Labyrinth, Powered by GZDoom.

name: Cauldron Caution
description: Cauldron Caution is a Point & Click adventure centered on Card battles ! Fight against cartoony monsters with your Magic Creatures & Ingredients ! Find hidden Booster Packs by exploring this wild world to improve your collection ! Meet quirky characters and solve diverse puzzles along the way !

name: Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator
description: Transform an abandoned aquarium park into a thriving water attraction! In "Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator," clean, decorate, and add fish to attract visitors. Dive in for rescue missions, upgrade your park, and build a vibrant ecosystem.

name: Cyborg-Prototype
description: 3D battle action meets roguelite! The battle cyborg you control is divided into six parts: head, torso, right arm, left arm, right leg, and left leg. Can you survive in the harsh combat experimental facility while repairing damaged parts or replacing them with equipment with powerful skills?

name: Weed Shop 4: Highland
description: VISIT HIGHLAND! Smoke the hottest strains, have them roll your blunts and pack your bowls. After grinding it out in Sunless Beach for over 3 years you deserve a vacation, so get toasty and enjoy your 420 TRIP!

name: Rise Of Anupet
description: Ready for a high action arena shooter based on the re-imaginary storyline of Stargate

name: Super Mario 64: Sonic Edition Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Picassio
description: A non-violent stealth / thief game which was in development by Promethean Designs, and would’ve been about an art thief. The game was scrapped due to the developers entering bankruptcy and being unable to find a publisher.

name: Ad Memoriam
description: Ad Memoriam is a mystery game about a band with a curse: at every single one of their concerts, someone dies of an accident. Follow the band and the trail of bodies that they leave behind, reconstruct each accident from witness testimony, and unravel the truth behind Ad Memoriam and it's curse.

name: Cult Land
description: Summon dozens of spirits in the poker game, play a straight flush, and slash the evil spirits!

name: Astrostrike
description: You are the captain of the Galactic battleship, building hundreds of gun turrets, raising dozens of space fighters, establishing aircraft carrier groups, space stations, and conquering the entire Milky Way

name: Icarus M: Guild War
description: A PC game ready to take you into fresh levels of adventure and exploration.

name: Blood Punk
description: Blood Punk is a hyper violent fast-paced retro FPS where you must exchange your health for bullets. Eviscerate giant abominations with the blood of an angel using deadly weapons in a dark fantasy comic book world.

name: Sigil of Chaos
description: Dive deep into the storyline, break through the hordes of enemies, collect rare loot, and try to resist your temptations… or, alternately, head to the arena and face off against other players. The Sigil of Chaos awaits its keeper.

name: Tapeheads
description: Tapeheads is an atmospheric retro-futuristic simulation. Use a one-of-a-kind computer and its programming language to solve puzzles, and play mini-games.

name: Voidstorm
description: Voidstorm is an on-rails shooter in space with twin stick controls. Fight epic space battles against fleets of enemies, engage and destroy capital ships, evade through narrow passages and save the federation together with your wingmates.

name: Skidrush
description: Fast and Furious in the City! Look out for skidrush! Win rewards by carrying out missions and collaborating with other players. Get a variety of vehicles, from sports cars to special vehicles Build your own vehicle.

name: Library of Lyria
description: Take care of the magical Library Of Lyria. Renovate the old building from a ruin into a wonderful, enchanted place that you fill with new life. Create or find new books, explore the world and take care of your customers. Will you help restore the Library of Lyria to its former glory?

name: Reconciliation
description: Psychological horror where you play as a young high schooler seeking reconciliation with an old friend. Unfortunately it won't be so easy, a perilous journey awaits you before you'll be able to reunite as friends once again.

name: Fragile Reflection
description: Coming back home went completely wrong: village got twisted by Noh masks and Reflection is piercing into our reality…. Find items, solve puzzles, fight monsters and traverse between dimensions - Help Kario Ito reveal hidden mysteries and stay alive in this retro-styled survival horror!

name: Shooting Range Simulator
description: Run your dream Shooting Range shop. Manage your supplies, rent guns and sell ammos which suits guns calibre. Modify your guns as you like. Expand and upgrade your shop, level up your popularity to get even better equipments. Join shooting tournaments or shoot your guns in your own range.

name: The Merry Fairy
description: The Merry Fairy is a cozy idle game where you collect beautiful decorations and create your scrapbook journal in a fairytale environment. Invite the enchanted Fairyland vibe into your life and discover your magic through the stories of Fairy and her friends!

name: Twisted to the Roots
description: Your loyal customer need your help. Take care of her backyard. Uncover some secrets while you're at it.

name: Kiki
description: Kiki, is a single player story driven action adventure game with survival elements where you will control Kiki as she goes into a journey to save her village from years of curse in a fantastic world.

name: Swamped!
description: Discover a Tower Defense as cute as it is addictive. Collect funny hats, magical equipment, and special powers to create the ultimate defense build. Explore an enchanted world filled with charming characters and challenges to overcome!

name: Cosminers
description: Start your career as a cosmic miner! During the day, mine raw materials, create new tools and lethal weapons. Build up your base to survive the night attacks of rampaging monsters. Protect yourself, gain wealth and fly away in a rocket, or turn your outpost into an impregnable fortress!

name: Chase the Gangsters
description: It seems that the law no longer works in the city. A super cop is needed!

name: Another Day with You
description: You have a date to make! But, it looks like you got there too early... Explore this quiet corner of a bustling city by talking with locals, playing at the arcade, fishing, and much more. Don't forget your date - you'll have to swoon them with your impressive charisma. It's Another Day with You.

name: Ari Buktu and the Anytime Elevator
description: Ari Buktu is a vibrant and thrilling story-rich 2.5D puzzle-platformer inspired by 80s adventures. Join the eccentric professor, playing as his unwitting student, Ari, on a cinematic time travel treasure hunt through history, filled with daring escapes and era-hopping chases.

name: Lost Tribe
description: Go on a dangerous journey to save your tribe! An unknown foe has turned the once peaceful island into chaos. With the help of an ancient guardian, you must uncover secrets, gain new abilities, and restore peace.

name: Yellow House
description: Yellow House is a non-linear visual horror novel. Dive into the grim atmosphere of a twisted mind surrounded by false and cruelty.

name: Seventh Song
description: Step into the role of a master strategist and manage a diverse group of adventurers. Send them on perilous expeditions to uncover ancient secrets, battle fearsome creatures, and retrieve legendary treasures.

name: Unko Technica
description: Enjoy the retro neon style graphics and cool sounds of this stylish UNKO action game as you guide the automatically running UNKO to the goal of the toilet by making it jump.

name: Knightly Gnomes
description: Knightly Gnomes is a Top-Down Strategy game where you choose to play as either the leader of the Knights or Gnomes and control troops in order to fight the enemy faction.

name: Green Ogre Gives You Terrible Life Advice and Dies
description: Enter the swamp and meet green ogre who will guide you through some of the struggles of life by giving you some God tier advice.

name: Legend of Parry King
description: Legend of Parry King is an action-packed boss-rush game inspired by the combat of Sekiro. Explore the beautiful eastern lands and face off against corrupted demons, defeating them through skillful parrying and dodging, without causing them harm.

name: Magical Merge: Fairy Adventure
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of "Magical Merge Fairy Adventure," where every turn is a new discovery in the art of magical cuisine. Join Rosie, a young and spirited girl, and her beloved granny-witch on an extraordinary journey through realms woven with fairy tales and culinary wonders.

name: Plungeez
description: Take a dive in the world of Plungeez, a puzzle platformer where Bonnie, a fierce woman who, after falling in the underground, must explore the sewers of Salvador in search of a way out. Light torches, boilers, and use plungers to climb and solve puzzles!

name: Park the Retro Car
description: "Park the Retro Car" is a challenging and exciting game that puts your parking skills to the test.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Treasure Hunter is a multigame collector and crafting game in which you can obtain items on different ways and craft or exchange them for others.

name: Rusted Awakening
description: A gothic horror shooter set in a rusted industrial nightmare. Inspired by John Romero, David Lynch, and Doom 64.

name: Spellbound: A Detective's Tale
description: Spellbound a detective´s tale is a Vr Noir/ Medieval fantasy inspired scape room in wich every time you start a new game every puzzle is randomized making every playthrough unique. Use All of your tools to scape the infinite tower.

name: Block Siege VR
description: Build your world and defenses in this unique and dynamic VR action-survival building game. Players can choose to casually build and save their own worlds or fight waves of robots in their world or in one of the unique environments. Players can utilize blocks and weapons to fight off waves of robots.

name: Crash-Land Fantasy
description: A mysterious magic force knocks your research satellite out of orbit. You crash land and you and your android captain must try to survive on this planet ruled by nature and figure out a way to get home while discovering what caused the force along the way.

name: Decipher the Deck
description: Decipher The Deck is a rule discovery puzzle game that turns traditional playing cards into interesting puzzle mechanics. Discover the secrets of cards, their abilities, and much more in 70 hand-crafted levels.

name: Peasant
description: Explore a beautiful medieval fantasy open world and defend your base against the so-called-heroes in this single player 3rd-person action RPG. Your choices create a dynamic experience in every playthrough!

name: Master Lemon: The Quest for Iceland
description: MASTER LEMON is a narrative adventure game inspired by a true story. Players solve puzzles and face challenges on a journey where freedom and dreams clash with tough choices. Join Lemon as he seeks to save a distant land from a memory-eating plague threatening world history and languages.

name: Mass Conflict: Ignition
description: Mass Conflict: Ignition offers a modernized classic RTS experience, inviting you to a battlefield filled with unique mechanics. Fight for power and resources in the midst of a global war!

name: Mall Manager Simulator
description: Join the "Mall Manager Simulator" community and start your journey to retail greatness today! Ready to create the mall of your dreams? Download now and let the management fun begin!

name: Sunny Side Crossing
description: A story-rich restaurant sim with slice-of-life RPG elements. Play as a newlywed couple inheriting a restaurant. Share duties with your spouse, from sourcing ingredients to managing the restaurant. Explore the world of Sunny Side Crossing through interactions with neighbors and customers.

name: Blightwreck

name: Madam of Malice
description: Dare to play a roguelike deckbuilder card game with the Madam? Find out about the thief girl who brakes into the wrong manor. Experience her horror story: hiding from killers, crawling, evading attacks, stealing valuable items and… hopefully getting out alive. She, and you as well.

name: Descendant
description: Descendant is a 2D dungeon exploration game with roguelite elements and turn-based RPG combat. Controlling a team of 4 characters, the player explores a mysterious cave filled with dangerous enemies, mystical locations and unclaimed treasure.

name: Life Codex
description: Life Codex is a journey of solitude within the pages of a book. Solve intricate puzzles to uncover the narrative. Step inside my temple, find opus on the table. To understand it all, I'll leave you just a label. Undress your bones - dance skeleton. And then you will know, what's the Point of it all.

name: Suppress Academician
description: An innovative game combining simulation management, auto chess, and strategy competition. Rebuild an ancient academy, recruit and train students. Utilize the Ban & Pick mechanism and resource management. The open creative workshop offers rich strategy and interactive experiences.

name: Private Mining Company
description: Private Mining Company is a tower defense game with perma-death and extraction elements. Keep your soldiers while you complete contracts, as long as they aren't killed. Make money defending mining outposts on hostile alien planets. Balance mining upgrades and growing your army.

name: She From The Future
description: In a bizarre fire two years ago, Mei lost her detective boyfriend. And now she is also a detective, and her goal is to find out the real cause of her boyfriend's death. And with her life in the detective agency, she is hooked up with the mysterious power that travels through time and space......

name: Fista Retro Horror Pack
description:
Travel back to the early days of the internet and play the slasher fan games that started it all! You play as Jason Voorhees, Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger & Candyman in these old-school games featuring MS Paint graphics and WAVs ripped from VHS tapes.

This is an all in one program that contains all 4 PC slasher fan games by Fista Productions.

name: Abyssus Deep Under
description:
Theme:
Abyssus Deep Under transports players into an underwater world, where the mysteries of the deep ocean await exploration and conquest. The game’s setting combines the allure of the unknown with the strategic demands of resource management and territorial expansion.

Genre:
This game is a blend of 4X (explore, expand, exploit, exterminate) and Real-Time Strategy (RTS), offering a unique mix of long-term strategic planning and real-time tactical combat. Players manage resources, develop technologies, and engage in underwater battles.

Abyssus Deep Under offers a deep, immersive experience with a nostalgic touch, inspired by classic 90s 3D isometric graphics. The game is available on both PC and mobile platforms, ensuring accessibility for a wide range of players.

name: No spikes, please!

name: Voyager Battles
description: "Voyager Battles invites you to a grid-based battlefield where strategy meets speed. Plan your moves, claim power-ups, and outmaneuver opponents in a fast-paced tactical showdown. Perfect for players seeking a mix of strategy and action. Become the master of the arena!"

name: Sigils of Slaughter
description: Use sketches and gestures to hack and slash and magic your way through an otherworldly uprising certain to raze the world to nihility. Navigate chaotic urban environments, bringing to bear supernatural weapons and questionable strategies. Embrace the gore. Become the nightmare.

name: Solitary Sentinel
description: Welcome to Solitary Sentinel, a captivating single-player roguelike tower defense experience where you must defend against constantly evolving enemies by upgrading a single tower. Enjoy simple controls, and deep strategic gameplay as you fend off the relentless onslaught!

name: Maze: Rising Trials

name: The Biggleboss Incident

Tom doesn’t have time to debate semantics, though; he’s dangerously late for work – and he hasn’t even started his big Project AGER pitch. …Or is that just what they want him to think?

Help aspiring chefs pass the assessment of the Culinary Bulletin's restaurant critic: upgrade kitchens, renovate interiors, and give owners a makeover. No one said adulthood was going to be easy, but it’ll be a little less painful to navigate with your two best friends by your side... and three new chance acquaintances, who happen to be the right people at the right time.

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon
description:
Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon is the otome standalone sequel to Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea, a Victorian vampire visual novel previously released in 2021. This visual novel is set around 5-6 years after the events of the first visual novel, following Lucie as the main character now that she's an adult.

Determined to make her own destiny as she turns 18, the young head of her family Lucie plunges headfirst in the conniving world of business dealings. Before she's able to seal the deal on a revolutionary treatment to vampirism, her business partner suddenly dies. Lucie finds herself embroiled in the middle of the mysterious death of her former partner and an event from a decade prior...

name: Tale of Two Sides

name: Whiskers in the Dark
description:
Lurk through the underground tunnels as you stealthily make your way through them in Whiskers in the Dark.

Play as a small cat confined to the space of the shadows, hiding away from the lights (and whatever's out there) seeking to hunt you down. Carefully make your way back to the other cats who've already made their escape, but be careful not to get caught!

name: Merely A Chip
description: You're Nelson, Perhaps waking up in the middle of the night is common, but not for Nelson. He's hungry and wants to eat something, but when he checks the kitchen, he can't find anything. He decides to buy some chips in the supermarket and head back home.

name: Super Chick
description: Introducing Super Chick, a captivating rage-platformer wrapped in an irresistibly cute aesthetic. Engage in solo or online multiplayer modes, where you can compete or playfully sabotage each other. Get ready to jump, dodge, and smile your way through Super Chick – where the only way is up!

name: Der Weichensteller: Odyssey Live
description: The internet is puzzled by a mysterious phenomenon: Posts are suddenly reappearing on the Instagram accounts of three deceased individuals. The only common denominator: all three died in accidents. The videos are cryptic, and no one can make sense of them. Therefore, the family of the deceased Wilson is asking for your help to get to the bottom of this case. In this murder mystery, you take on the role of Consulting Detectives Falkenberg.

name: Half-Life: Through The City
description: Through The City is a fan spin-off mod for Half-Life 2, telling the story of how City 17 Uprising began and survived it's course. Step into the boots of Corporal Adrian Shephard as he is taken out of the stasis by the G-man. While dealing with trauma of the Black Mesa Incident, Adrian takes on a dangerous task to join an unknown resistance group and begin the Uprising while facing new, never-before-seen threats.

name: Korobo
description: Korobo is an action adventure game that follows the story of a pint-sized robot named “Korobo” and his owner, Tom, a young boy who receives Korobo as a gift from his father on his 10th birthday. Players step into the tiny but mighty shoes of Korobo, embarking on a thrilling and heartfelt journey.

name: Promises to Keep
description:
Promises to Keep (PTK) is a queer, furry, safe-for-work (16+) visual novel.

PTK follows the journey of a post-college snow leopard after returning to his childhood home. After a year of wishful thinking, living in the footsteps of his past and the childhood promises he has yet to fulfill, he's convinced there's nothing more for him here. Then, disaster strikes.

The current version has around 5 hours of content, featuring an original soundtrack of 15 songs, over 50 beautifully drawn backgrounds and fully-illustrated CGs, and nearly 100 unique character sprites.

name: Dodgeball Dojo
description: Big 2 Family Friend Card Game. Play competitive card games inspired by Big 2 with friends and family! Collect cool anime and manga Spirit Pets, and watch Athletes dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge!

Fit everyone in the bed! Make sure they're happy so they can get COSY

Meet Alex, Max, their friends and Mr Whiskers in this surreal world where people can only move by the designs of an omnipresent hand (that is you, the player).

Make sure you fulfill their desires. Do it for the cosy.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 with the theme Limited Space

The vocal who disappeared before the festival appeared in front of my eyes 10 years later?!"28" is a slice-of-life variety rhythm game that takes place in the band of Soun Girls' High School.Cute characters + The joy of hitting the beat + Immersive scenarios, Let's enjoy them now!

New latin spanish voicelines and texts, menus, descriptions for characters, subtitles, and renders are also included here as some extra details. There's also new missions for Ultimate Battle mode. The most notable change it's that now there are more detailed and epic damaged skins, when you recover from an strong attack you will have your clothes very destroyed with almost all characters.
